tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE players ( player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50), player_level INT );

CREATE TABLE items ( item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, item_name VARCHAR(50), item_type VARCHAR(50), owner_id UUID );

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (
    player_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING);CREATE TABLE item (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_name STRING, item_description STRING);CREATE TABLE player_inventory (player_id INT, item_id INT, quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, item_id));CREATE TABLE item_category (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name STRING, FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES item(item_id));

CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
player_level INT,
guild_name VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE items (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
item_type VARCHAR(50),
item_quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE inventory (inv_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT,
item_id INT,
quantity_owned INT,
FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(item_id));

CREATE TABLE item_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE player_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
player_id INT,
log_description TEXT,
log_date TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id));
